info.game_comments:
Ken Jennings game 6.

(Jimmy: If you can't run away and join the circus, the next best thing is clues about Cirque du Soleil--next on Jeopardy!)

(1, 1).clue: After her husband's death in 1968, she founded a center in Atlanta, Georgia for nonviolent social change

(2, 1).clue: Yeah, baby! Mike Myers has played this groovy secret agent in 3 films
